body_html: Hi, it seems to be working fine for me with @hantingxie 's solution. For some reason desipte ./configure recognizing my default path I still had to manually set my PYTHON_BIN_PATH. And yes, this is happening in the default dockerfile that's mentioned in the tensorflow serving docs.

body: Hi, it seems to be working fine for me with @hantingxie 's solution. For some reason desipte ./configure recognizing my default path I still had to manually set my PYTHON_BIN_PATH. And yes, this is happening in the default dockerfile that's mentioned in the tensorflow serving docs.
